languages.text: {n}Увы, далеко не сразу стражам колонии удалось отыскать способ укрыть себя от загадочного врага.{/n}
{n}Alas, it took some time for the colony's wardens to come up with an effective camouflage that could hide them from this mysterious foe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увы, далеко не сразу стражам колонии удалось отыскать способ укрыть себя от загадочного врага.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alas, it took some time for the colony's overseers to come up with an effective camouflage that could hide them from this mysterious foe.{/n}

{n}Alas, it took some time for the colony's wardens to come up with an effective camouflage that could hide them from this mysterious foe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}遗憾的是，殖民地的看守们花了好多时间才找到了行之有效的伪装，在神秘的敌人面前隐藏起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, it took some time for the colony's wardens to come up with an effective camouflage that could hide them from this mysterious foe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遗憾的是，殖民地的看守们花了好多时间才找到了行之有效的伪装，在神秘的敌人面前隐藏起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por desgracia, los alcaides de la colonia tardaron en idear un camuflaje eficaz contra este misterioso enemigo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, it took some time for the colony's wardens to come up with an effective camouflage that could hide them from this mysterious foe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por desgracia, los alcaides de la colonia tardaron en idear un camuflaje eficaz contra este misterioso enemigo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、コロニーの監督者たちがこの正体不明の敵から身を隠せるような効果的なカモフラージュを考え出すまでには時間を要した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, it took some time for the colony's wardens to come up with an effective camouflage that could hide them from this mysterious foe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、コロニーの監督者たちがこの正体不明の敵から身を隠せるような効果的なカモフラージュを考え出すまでには時間を要した。{/n}
{n}しかし、コロニーの監督者たちがこの正体不明の敵から身を隠せるような効果的なカモフラージュを考え出すまでには時間を要した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hélas, il faut du temps aux gardiens de la colonie pour trouver un camouflage efficace permettant de les cacher aux yeux de ce monstre mystérieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, it took some time for the colony's wardens to come up with an effective camouflage that could hide them from this mysterious foe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hélas, il faut du temps aux gardiens de la colonie pour trouver un camouflage efficace permettant de les cacher aux yeux de ce monstre mystérieux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es dauerte eine Weile, bis die Wächter der Kolonie eine effektive Tarnung entwickelt hatten, die sie vor dem mysteriösen Feind verbergen konnte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, it took some time for the colony's wardens to come up with an effective camouflage that could hide them from this mysterious foe.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es dauerte eine Weile, bis die Wächter der Kolonie eine effektive Tarnung entwickelt hatten, die sie vor dem mysteriösen Feind verbergen konnte.{/n}
{n}Es dauerte eine Weile, bis die Aufseher der Kolonie eine effektive Tarnung entwickelt hatten, die sie vor dem mysteriösen Feind verbergen konnte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Koloni müdürlerinin esrarengiz düşmandan gizlenmek için etkili bir kamuflaj bulmaları biraz zaman aldı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, it took some time for the colony's wardens to come up with an effective camouflage that could hide them from this mysterious foe.{/n}
